name: Red Cell Beat
description:
First time making a game for the GODOT engine! I honestly fell for SCOPECREPE here and i had tons of ideas for this project and it all fell through, somehow my project got corrupt, and making my game and engine crash last night.  last minute i strung together all that i could to muster up a playable game just to submit. Tons of emotions here, but i am glad i was able to submit something! granted this isn't what i intended to make, but hey it's something

hope you enjoy the game, thanks!
